3016987351.name: Counterattack

2383960413.name: Cruel Remedy
2383960413.text:

On Precision / Elemental Shields Hits.

3523296417.name: Demolitionist

3047969693.name: Desperado

Reloading within 6 seconds after a Precision Kill:
increases your Rate of Fire to 600RPM for 7 seconds. Reduces damage against Combatants by 20%
Can be refreshed.

1683379515.name: Disruption Break
1683379515.text:

2848615171.name: Dragonfly
2848615171.text:

1359896290.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
